text:
> > You need to write this in a commit message for the issue to be closed (it can be anywhere in the commit message).
> 
> Yes I misunderstood one of @lesteve tips about how to achieve this. Need to read more about these useful features.

You need to put it in the description of the PR (and IIRC you have to do it when you create the PR you can not edit the PR description later to add it).

The github [doc](https://github.com/blog/1506-closing-issues-via-pull-requests) about closing issue from PR and the list of [magical keywords](https://help.github.com/articles/closing-issues-via-commit-messages/) you can use.
